message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SI 

The paper deals with challenges and future directions in the field of hotel recommendation systems, which involves information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (LG) techniques. The paper also discusses the importance of considering user experience and human-computer interaction (HC) in the design of such systems, which falls under the category of computer systems and human-centered computing (CY). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of big data and computational requirements, which could be relevant to the sub-category of social and information networks (SI).
